home.title: Direct Support for Myanmar Earthquake Victims
home.subtitle: Connect directly with affected families and provide immediate assistance without intermediaries. Every donation goes directly to those who need it most.
home.howItWorksDescription: Our platform enables direct peer-to-peer support with transparency and security
home.registerDescription: Affected families register with verification of identity and needs
home.registerContent: Secure registration process with identity verification and location confirmation to ensure legitimacy of all requests for aid.
home.donateDescription: Browse verified families and donate directly to them
home.donateContent: Choose a family based on their needs and location. Make direct payments through bank transfer, mobile money, or cryptocurrency.
home.transparencyDescription: Track donations and see the impact of your support
home.transparencyContent: Public donation ledger shows verified transactions. Families can acknowledge receipt and share how the aid has helped them.
